remarks: Transfer universal quantification from a variable ` x ` to another variable ` y ` contained in expression ` A ` .  (Contributed by NM, 18-Feb-2007.)
statement:
alxfr.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
alxfr $p |- ( ( A. y A e. B /\ A. x E. y x = A ) -> ( A. x ph <-> A. y ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d x y $.
